thread.title: They Said What?!: Find Out What Kristen Bell, Julius Peppers, And Paul Giamatti Have To Say
thread.title_full: They Said What?!: Find Out What Kristen Bell, Julius Peppers, And Paul Giamatti Have To Say

title: They Said What?!: Find Out What Kristen Bell, Julius Peppers, And Paul Giamatti Have To Say
text: Like Ever wonder what’s on the mind of today’s most notable people? Well, don’t miss our unbelievable roundup of the best and most talked about quotes of the day: “ Every time I go to Chipotle, I always get a cup for water. But instead of filling it up with water, I only fill it up with ice. That way, when it melts, I get colder water without having to pay more for it. ” —Kristen Bell On being thrifty “ If you want to congratulate me on a play, a pat on the back is fine. A high-five is fine. Heck, even a little slap on the behind is fine. But, you damn sure better not take out my mouth guard, use it to quickly make an exact mold of my teeth, put the mold of my teeth into your own mouth, and then smile at me using my own teeth. ” —Julius Peppers On respecting boundaries “ People forget that acting’s a job, and that means we all have to wear hard hats on set. But it’s someone else’s job to edit the hats out, and that’s when it all becomes art again. ” —Paul Giamatti
